wikipedia_page.main: Francis Watt (born 16 February 1866) was a Scottish footballer, who played for Kilbirnie, Queen's Park, Clydesdale Harriers, Rangers and Scotland. Watt scored three goals in four appearances for Scotland.

response: * 16 February – Frank Watt (d. unknown), Scotland international in four matches, scoring three goals (1889–1891).
